meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dhruv Srinivasachar Jill Hurtt Hannah McIntyre Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7849.

td.p: Dhruv Srinivasachar, a medical and doctoral student from Richmond, Virginia
Jill Hurtt, a teacher and librarian from Hemingford, Nebraska
Hannah McIntyre, an author from Whistler, British Columbia, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,200)

tr.td: DOC TREBEK'S DIAGNOSIS
TV
SERIOUS TALK
HEY JOE
WHERE YOU GOING?
WITH THAT LUNCH IN YOUR HAND

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'You\'ve got allergic rhinitis, this ailment that can increase with the advent of spring')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: You've got allergic rhinitis, this ailment that can increase with the advent of spring

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_5_4', 'clue_DJ_5_4_stuck', '(Jill: What is Marsh of Dreams?)
(Dhruv: What is the Marsh of Slumber?)
[Jill\'s response was originally ruled incorrect, and Dhruv\'s response was originally ruled correct. Before Final Jeopardy!, Jill\'s response was ruled correct, and Dhruv\'s response was ruled incorrect. The players\' scores were adjusted as if Jill\'s response had been initially accepted and Dhruv had not had the chance to respond incorrectly because of that.]

the Marsh of Sleep

Jill
')

tr.td: Hannah
Jill
Dhruv

$7,801
Baltimore oriole')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
